What's New: âœ¨

  • Added support for Hardware Acceleration using NVIDIA GPUs. See Docs on how to enable! ğŸš€
  • Completely rewritten the trailer download and conversion process for better performance and reliability. Can be enabled in Settings > Experimental > New Download Method ğŸ”„
  • Added batch edit in Movies and Series pages to quickly edit multiple items at once. Available options: Monitoring, Download, Delete ğŸ“¦

  • Trailer download status will be updated as they progress, instead of all at once in Download Monitored Trailers task. ğŸ”„
  • av1 conversion has been disabled. If av1 is selected, app will try to download in av1 directly if available, else fallback to vp9. ğŸš«

Bug Fixes: ğŸ›
